text: Fastajaba Lahum Rabbuhum 'Anni La 'Uđi`u `Amala `Amilin Minkum Min Dhakarin 'Aw 'Untha Ba`đukum Min Ba`đin Fa-Al-Ladhina Hajaru Wa 'Ukhriju Min Diyarihim Wa 'Udhu Fi Sabili Wa Qatalu Wa Qutilu La'ukaffiranna `Anhum Sayyi'atihim Wa La'udkhilannahum Jannatin Tajri Min Tahtiha Al-'Anharu Thawabaan Min `Indi Allahi Wa Allahu `Indahu Husnu Ath-Thawabi
